subject: How to run the test cases using maven
msgSnippet: Hi All, I am new to maven.Please anybody tell me how can I declare the test cases in maven-pom.xml. And how to run the test cases. Thanks & Regards, Thanuja.
messageBody:
Hi All,

I am new to maven.Please anybody tell me how can I declare the
test cases in maven-pom.xml. And how to run the test cases.

Thanks & Regards,
Thanuja.
